abstract: Authorities seized evidence from the home office of Vitaly Borker, who was accused of abusing customers to generate Web buzz that led to more business.
snippet: Authorities seized evidence from the home office of Vitaly Borker, who was accused of abusing customers to generate Web buzz that led to more business.
lead_paragraph: Federal law enforcement agents on Monday arrested a Brooklyn Internet merchant who mistreated customers because he thought their online complaints raised the profile of his business in Google searches.

headline.main: U.S. Arrests Online Seller Who Scared Customers
headline.print_headline: U.S. Arrests Online Seller Who Scared Customers

abstract: How Amy Gottesman built Smash Party Entertainment into a thriving business.
snippet: How Amy Gottesman built Smash Party Entertainment into a thriving business.
lead_paragraph: Six years ago, after leaving a high-powered career in fashion sales to become a stay-at-home mother of very young children, Amy Gottesman found herself missing her income — and looking for something to do when her kids were napping. So Ms. Gottesman, who lives on Long Island, put up a Web site under the name of Smash Party Entertainment, offering entertainment for parties, ranging from casinos to living Roman “statues” to murder mysteries.
